org.shingo.shingoeventsapp.ui

Class TouchImageView.DoubleTapZoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shingo.shingoeventsapp.ui.TouchImageView.DoubleTapZoom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    TouchImageView

    private class TouchImageView.DoubleTapZoom
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    DoubleTapZoom calls a series of runnables which apply an animated zoom in/out graphic to the image.
    Author:
    Ortiz

      void run() 
      private void translateImageToCenterTouchPosition(float t)
      Interpolate between where the image should start and end in order to translate the image so that the point that is touched is what ends up centered at the end of the zoom.
